name: dmg :: events (Middle East Asia)
description: dmg :: events Middle East has operated since 1995 delivering exhibitions conferences events and publications across the Energy Construction Hospitality Commercial Residential and Interiors industries.As a leading supplier of face-to-face business information with a customer-centric focus that localizes operations and relationships our objectives are to keep businesses informed and connect them with relevant consumers to create vibrant marketplaces across multiple event platforms.

address.streetAddress: 5th Floor The Palladium Cluster C Jumeirah Lakes Towers P.O. Box 33817

name: Dubai World Trade Centre
description: At the Dubai World Trade Centre (DWTC) we come together to deliver the worlds leading commercial destination. From organising global events to managing state-of-the-art venues from developing dynamic commercial environments to providing seamless value-added services our businesses are dedicated to creating unique and outstanding customer experiences. With a vision to make Dubai the worlds leading destination for all major exhibitions conferences and events DWTC has evolved from being the forerunner of the fast growing exhibitions industry into a multi-dimensional business catalyst focusing on Venues Events and Real Estate Management. Complimentary to the product offerings is a suite of value added services ranging from Wedding Organising Media/Advertising Technical Engineering and Security services to its award winning Hospitality portfolio.

name: Informa Connect
description: Informa Exhibitions is a global market leader in such end markets as Boating Beauty Construction & Real Estate Life Sciences Maritime Health & Nutrition Agriculture and Pop Culture.

address.streetAddress: Level 20 Dubai World Trade Center Tower

name: Messe Frankfurt Middle East GmbH
description: Messe Frankfurt Middle East GmbH is a part of Messe Frankfurt, the leading global player for organizing trade fairs of international standards and credited with an experience of over 800 years. The United Arab emirate unit of Messe Frankfurt Middle East GmbH is headed by CEO Ahmed Pauwels and is now being considered as one of the most potential strategy planners for mutual business growth, nurturing new business opportunities by mutual interaction, cooperation, and development ventures. Messe Frankfurt Middle East GmbH organizes premium targeted, industry focused exhibitions and trade shows of international standard in and around Middle East, Arabian Gulf, Iran, Africa, Sub-continental countries, and former CIS territory. Most of the events of this exclusive event organizer are based at Dubai. Garden+Landscaping Middle East, Paperworld Middle East, Hardware & Tools Middle East, etc are some of the most talked-about events of this institution.

address.streetAddress: 14th Floor, The H Dubai, Office Tower, One Sheikh Zayed Road, P.O. Box 26761

name: DLG
description: DLG International GmbH takes a leading role in consulting internationally operating organisations and institutions in the field of technical co-operation as well as its own subsidiaries and partners.

name: Expo Centre Sharjah
description: Expo Centre Sharjah or ECS is an International Trade Help that came into being in 1977 and has placed the emirate of Sharjah on the map of international exhibitions. It is the exhibition wing of the Sharjah Chamber of Commerce and Industry. General Director Mr. Saif Al Midfa aims at leveraging the customer experience and simplifying trading process through the various meets and exhibitions they organize. With representations in Europe Asia and Australia for the past 20 years it has been a popular launch pad for new products and a promoter of the existing ones. Through its B2B shows it aims to bring traders together in a much-focused manner to convert market opportunities into definite sales leads. It also has a host of highly successful B2C series to its credit in a variety of sectors ranging from books to bikes.

name: Dome Exhibitions
description: Dome Exhibitions was established in 1991 at Abu Dhabi and year 2002 in Dubai as exhibition stand builders serving the multi-billion dollar MICE industry in the Middle East. Soon from induction Dome became a well reputed stand building organization in UAE and neighboring Gulf Countries armed with experienced and skilled designers technicians craftsmen and graphic artists under a dynamic management.

name: International Conferences & Exhibitions LLC
description: International Conferences & Exhibitions LLC one of the longest established independent exhibition and conference organisers operating in Dubai.

name: Aviation Week
description: Aviation Week Network’s events include the largest series of MRO conferences and exhibitions as well as events focused on engines, financing, and urban air mobility. They are designed to complement our content, data/analytics and digital tools and provide a unique environment for delivering the most timely and accurate intelligence available combined with interactive sessions and solutions.Our air transport events are centered around the Routes series which is entirely focused on aviation route development.  The series includes world-renowned airline and airport networking events through its regional and World Route Development Forums. They are held in key markets throughout the year in Asia, Europe and the Americas.

name: F&E AEROSPACE
description: Fairs and Exhibitions have been delivering world class events since 1958. The company now creates and organizes international trade events for business and consumers from all over the world. Since the mid 1970's the company has focused on events in the rapidly developing West Asia and Middle East, specifically the Gulf region in Dubai, UAE, one of today's most vibrant trading zones with the world's fastest growing economy.

name: Informa PLC
description: Informa is a leading international events intelligence and scholarly research group.We’re the specialist’s specialist. Through hundreds of powerful brands we work with businesses and professionals in specialist markets providing the connections intelligence and opportunities that help customers grow do business make breakthroughs and take better informed decisions.Informa is listed on London Stock Exchange and a member of FTSE 100 with over 11000 colleagues working in more than 30 countries.

name: INDEX Conferences & Exhibitions Organisation Est.
description: INDEX Conferences and Exhibitions Organisation Est. was established on January 1991 as a 100% UAE national private company highly specialised in organizing International and Regional medical and scientific conferences and exhibitions. It is a member of The FDI World Dental Federation International Hospital Federation The Dubai Quality Group and other several international organisations. INDEX has worldwide agents & a working joint venture with recognised government associations and a professional team focused on providing the best services.

address.streetAddress: INDEX Holding Headquarter, Road D-62, Opposite to Nad Al Hammar P.O Box: 13636
iQ Square, 1120-113 Cherry Street, Seattle, Washington, 98104
twofour54, Building 4level 2, Office 206,PO Box 77840, Abu Dhabi, UAE

name: Society of Petroleum Engineers
description: The Society of Petroleum Engineers (SPE) was officially founded in 1957 but its roots date back to the 19th century. SPE annually organizes more than 100 events around the world devoted to technical information exchange in the upstream oil and gas industry.

name: Orange Fairs & Events
description: Orange Fairs & Events is a leading Dubai based organization providing Event related services especially in the Middle East market. We organize and market int'l trade exhibitions, conferences,seminars,workshops,trainingcourses and market research regularly on topical issues for established and start-up companies to help them identify new and growing market opportunities. Our core strength lies in providing up-to-date marketing,business services and solutions to different market segments. We promote over 100 exhibitions annually in Africa, CIS, Middle East and Europe. The exhibitions promoted cover main industries ranging from General Trade Exhibitions, Education, Food & Beverage, Electrical and Electronics, Manufacturing, Health, Automobiles, Gold & Jewellery, Oil & Gas, Telecommunications, IT, Building & Construction amongst others.

name: Terrapinn Middle East Fz Llc
description: Terrapinn Middle East Fz Llc is a leading trade fair organizer for many national & international exhibitions in all over the world.

address.streetAddress: P O Box 502685, EIB Building No.01, Office 305-307, Dubai Media City

name: Bureau International des Expositions
description: Bureau International des Expositions is one of the most recognized organizations that are dedicated to the field of international expositions. This company was founded by the Convention Relating to International Exhibitions. In the year 1928 this intergovernmental organization was incepted. The aim of this bureau is to control the Expos or Worlds Fairs which are the international expositions along with many other exhibits in the place of over 100 member nations. This organization is also known as BIE which is its abbreviation. Mr. Vicente Gonzalez Loscertales is the Secretary General of this bureau. The main office of this organization is situated in Avenue d Iena Paris France. Shanghai World Expo China Forum and Worlds Fair Symposium are some of the many events that have been organized by BIE.

name: (DEWA) Dubai Electricity & Water Authority
description: Dubai Electricity & Water Authority is an events & trade shows organiser in the electricity & water industry.

name: Crain Communications
description: Crain Communications is one of the largest privately-owned business publishers in the U.S. with 32 business trade and consumer publications and related web sites in North America, Europe and Asia.

name: Reed Exhibitions Middle East
description: With a unique network of offices and international sales promoters our market reach is extensive: in 2013 over six million participants attended our events.We have a growing portfolio of over 500 events in 40 countries including trade and consumer exhibitions conferences and meetings ranging across 43 industry sectors â from aerospace and aviation to beauty and cosmetics to sports and recreation.

name: The Arablab Group
description: The Arablab Group, over the years has established itself as a dynamic institution and is renowned for its world class organizing services. Ever since the launch of the first Arablab trade show in 1983, the company has rapidly emerged out to be the foremost exhibition organization in Dubai. The Group is primarily dedicated in providing well organized trade fairs related to petroleum, environmental research & analysis and medical sectors. The trade fairs and exhibitions conducted by Arablab, have always been successful in attracting the largest number of buyers, distributors and consumers world-wide and has garnered a distinctive reputation for itself. It provides promotional mailing service to the analytical Industry and also a wide range of web designing services to its clients. Its events, exhibitions and trade shows have always turned out to be the melting pot for potential buyers and visitors from over 72 countries and for exchanging maximum business opportunities.

name: Al Fajer Information & Services (AFIS)
description: Al Fajer Information & Services (AFIS) is a highly commendable organization and since 1973 established itself as the leading organizing company in Dubai and overseas.

name: Center for Advanced Professional Practices
description: Center for Advanced Professional Practices is a rare organization that is dedicated to the dental and facial health sector. The organization is also known as CAPP which is its abbreviation. This organization is one of the leading Continuing Medical Education or CME providers. The main office of this association is situated in Dubai United Arab Emirates. This dental academy is one of the major organizations that offer various courses on this discipline. The aim of this academy is to bring forth an all round development in the entire dental care and discipline. Iraqi Dental Reunion IDA Annual Conference is one symposium that has been organized by this association in the past. Dental Facial Cosmetic International Conference and Aesthetic Dentistry Awards are some of the events that would be organized by this academy in the future.

address.streetAddress: Office P204-P205, Onyx Tower 2, The Greens, PO Box 450355

name: Stamegna Retail Management
description: Stamegna Retail Management connects buyers with sellers to support the rollout of exciting new consumer products on the market. We run private b2b events to improve the FMCG market. We bring Manufacturers, Retailers, and Distributors together helping the best products reach the market directly. Creating Stamegna Networks across regions and countries we provide you with primal business contacts that are eager to work together.

name: Planetfair GmbH Co. KG
description: Planetfair  GmbH is  a young team of old exhibition professionals having a  connected network of competent partners. Planetfair is very famous for the exhibition it organizes in multiple countries and  know all about core markets in Germany Eastern Europe and the former CIS. Planetfair finds the right exhibition for you. Because of subsidiaries in Dubai Istanbul and Singapore Planetfair has also outstanding contacts knowledge and fairs in the Middle East and the Far East as well as in that particularly booming fair market Turkey. Planetfair is also familiar with other markets like in India or North Africa. It organizes fair in multiple categories like education construction agriculture wedding and medical etc.

name: VNU Exhibitions Europe
description: VNU Group is a globally operating exhibition company with offices in Utrecht, Shanghai and Bangkok, and consolidates the international exhibition business of Royal Dutch Jaarbeurs. The Group is divided into three separate and distinct companies – VNU Europe, VNU Asia and VNU Asia Pacific – which closely cooperate across borders. For its international exhibition and conference business, Jaarbeurs has formed strategic Joint Ventures with influential partners in China and South East Asia. VNU Europe is located in Utrecht, The Netherlands, within the extensive Jaarbeurs complex. The international team is wholly focused on the livestock sector, focusing on the organization of the worldwide VIV portfolio. VNU’s Utrecht team organizes shows in the Netherlands, the United Arab Emirates, China, Thailand, Turkey and Russia.

address.streetAddress: Jaarbeursplein 6NL-3521 AL UtrechtP.O. Box 8800NL-3503 RV Utrecht

name: GLOBAL LINKS EXHIBITIONS & CONFERENCES ORGANISERS PTY LTD
description: Global Links Exhibitions have been an active part of the region’s organic and natural industry since year 2002. It has gained immense credibility within the supplier and buyer community worldwide for their service delivery quality and performance with the organization of Middle East Organic & Natural Products Expo Dubai. This credibility comes from their proximity and understanding of the region’s buyer market.

name: Worldwide Events
description: The Meeting & Incentive Forums is a prestigious organization serving a marketplace that demanded a fresh approach. It was founded in 2006 in London and since then it is engaged in organizing events and trade fairs in and outside the region. Their each event is based on face-to-face business with pre-scheduled appointments booked by buyers according to their requirements. There is also plenty of dedicated time for networking through innovative and fun social activities. Their organized programs are designed to set new standards for events in the travel sector and bring the highest quality buyers along with providing high Return On Investment for their clients.

name: International Association of Drilling Contractors.
description: International Association of Drilling Contractors is one of the leading trade fair organizer in USA. The company has hosted many successful event every year.
